title: Customer two performs concurrent booking attempt Snapshot

view.title: Customer two performs concurrent booking attempt
view.subtitle: Second concurrent booking created.

blocks.title: What user sees at a glance

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Unified Operations Dispatch Board Across Fulfillment + Staffing. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

requestBody.failureMessage: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

resultPayload.note: Step skipped: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

evidence.error: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Subscription creation with trial period". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.
data.failureMessage: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

resultPayload.note: Step skipped: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

evidence.error: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

data.instruction: Configure pricing defaults for the offer lifecycle including call fees/manual surge if UC needs imply it.
data.expectedResult: Pricing model persists and future bookings can calculate totals deterministically.
